results.text: You muster your powers of leadership to help soothe your allies of their woes. When you and your allies next spend hit dice to recover HP, they recover an additional amount equal to your proficiency bonus. This bonus lasts until you complete a short rest.
You quickly devise a plan of give-and-take in the heat of the moment. For the next hour you gain an expertise die to checks made to negotiate.

You know how to insert yourself into important social circles. For the next 24 hours, you gain a +2 bonus to Prestige checks made to secure audiences with important figures, such as lords, politicians, or guildmasters.
You have a way with words, particularly when it comes to encouraging someone to take a different course of action. You have advantage on your next Persuasion roll against the target creature.

You’re not afraid to grease a palm or two to get what you want or where you want to go. For the next hour, you have advantage on checks made to find someone susceptible to a bribe and your bribes cost half the amount of gold they would otherwise.
You are a master of compliments, even if you don’t fully believe in them. The target creature of your flattery becomes charmed by you (as in the charmed condition) for the next minute.
